popt4jlib

Interface OptimizerIntf

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConstrainedOptimizerIntf, LocalOptimizerIntf
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AcceleratedGradientDescent, Adam, Adam4FFNN, AlternatingVariablesDescent, ArmijoBFGS, ArmijoSteepestDescent, ArmijoSteepestDescentST, DDE, DDE2, DEA, DFA, DGA, DGABH, DLS, DLSM, DPSO, DSA, FletcherConjugateGradient, FletcherConjugateGradientST, IdentitySearchOptimizer, MCS, PDMiniBatchBackPropagation, PolakRibiereConjugateGradient, PolakRibiereConjugateGradientST, RandomDescents, RnQTCnbinFixedTOpt, RnQTCnbinOpt, RnQTCnormFixedTOpt, RnQTCnormOpt, SGD4FFNN, sSTCdetFixedTOpt, sSTCpoissonFixedTOpt, sSTCpoissonOpt

    public interface OptimizerIntf
    the interface every optimizer (for unconstrained optimization) must implement.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PairObjDouble minimize(FunctionIntf f)
      the unique method every optimizer for unconstrained optimization must implement.
      void setParams(java.util.HashMap params)
      set this object's parameters needed for the optimization process.

    • Method Detail

      • minimize

        PairObjDouble minimize(FunctionIntf f)
                throws OptimizerException
        the unique method every optimizer for unconstrained optimization must implement.
        Parameters:
        f - FunctionIntf
        Returns:
        PairObjDouble returning the arg-min together with the min value found
        Throws:
        OptimizerException

      • setParams

        void setParams(java.util.HashMap params)
        throws OptimizerException
        set this object's parameters needed for the optimization process. For optimizers that implement the LocalOptimizerIntf, the parameter set must always contain a starting point from which to start the local optimization process (with key that is usually "[X.]x0" where X is an abbreviated name of the method employed).
        Parameters:
        params - HashMap
        Throws:
        OptimizerException
